plot: Six young Angelenos struggle with the vagaries of life, love, and art as they drench themselves in sun, booze, and drugs at an all-day picnic in a beautiful wilderness.
title: The Picnic
plot_es: Six young Angelenos struggle with the vagaries of life, love, and art as they drench themselves in sun, booze, and drugs at an all-day picnic in a beautiful wilderness.
plot_en: Six young Angelenos struggle with the vagaries of life, love, and art as they drench themselves in sun, booze, and drugs at an all-day picnic in a beautiful wilderness.
